title: BadJelly the witch
creator_credit: Norma Farnes, Anne Wood, Norma Farnes Management and Ragdoll Productions
brief_description: Spike Milligan narrates this animated story of two children in search of a lost cow and the adventures this leads them to. They come across interesting and friendly animals who indeed save them from the nasty witch, BadJelly, and her hungry, nasty friend. All ends up well for the children and their cow. Spike Milligan wrote the imaginative story as well as narrates.
